byline.original: By MICHAEL D. SHEAR and ERIC LICHTBLAU

abstract: White House announces Pres Obama has taken steps to encourage development of so-called smart-gun technology and to give FBI access to more mental health records as part of federal policy meant to better identify people who should be barred from purchasing guns.
snippet: An initiative to encourage development of smart guns is intended to confront firearms violence amid opposition to broader gun control measures....
lead_paragraph: An initiative to encourage development of smart guns is intended to confront firearms violence amid opposition to broader gun control measures.

headline.main: Obama Puts His Weight Behind Smart-Gun Technology
headline.print_headline: Obama Puts Weight Behind ‘Smart-Gun’ Technology, Fueling N.R.A. Objections
